body:
did a load of laundry, filled up my pill organizer for the week, wrote some unit tests for a new feature i'm working on

shrimp scampi leftovers, plums and nectarines, ice in drinks                                                                                                                                                                                         

the way that, with a gas stove, you can leave a pot on a burner after turning it off

new _bachelor in paradise_ tonight (also, we have been watching first season of _are you the one_, which features classic MTV levels of drunken idiocy)

the way miso, in the middle of an intense play sesh, will go to the kitchen for a water break

the instagram account @angryshiba\_fanclub which e shared, because it's reassuring when you see videos of other people's dogs acting psychotic in the same way that yours does

foam rolling my legs before going on a run

angela lansbury's workout video "positive moves" which i learned about from my coworker a and which is so darn pleasant (

[https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=-eXdJHVf9gU](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=-eXdJHVf9gU))

tv news blooper compilations on youtube and being reminded by this classic ([https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=K1ljOcl39PQ](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=K1ljOcl39PQ)) that one of my favorite arcane categories of joke is cutting to a horrible police sketch
